result:
Risk Item: military
Institution A: Henan University
Relationship Type: Direct
Finding Summary: On September 8, 2024, Henan University's School of Physical Education (河南大学体育学院) signed a strategic cooperation framework agreement with the All-Army Military Training Medical Research Institute (全军军事训练医学研究所). This agreement aims to foster deep cooperation in civil-military integration, specifically focusing on the innovative development of military training medicine and sports disciplines through resource sharing and complementary advantages.
Intermediary B: None

raw_data.finding_summary: On September 8, 2024, Henan University's School of Physical Education (河南大学体育学院) signed a strategic cooperation framework agreement with the All-Army Military Training Medical Research Institute (全军军事训练医学研究所). This agreement aims to foster deep cooperation in civil-military integration, specifically focusing on the innovative development of military training medicine and sports disciplines through resource sharing and complementary advantages.

key_evidence.text: This agreement aims to foster deep cooperation in civil-military integration, specifically focusing on the innovative development of military training medicine and sports disciplines through resource sharing and complementary advantages.
Henan University's participation in this provincial-level military training initiative demonstrates an indirect link to military activities and organizations.

This indicates an institutional mandate or focus on civil-military integration within the university's research administration, aligning with broader national strategies for integrating civilian and defense sectors.
